T03bsa031_u:680: vaiśiṣṭyamevamabhidhāya viśiṣṭānāṃ viśiṣṭa eva mārga iti prakṛtapratyekabuddhamārgamāha -
T03bsa031_u:686: viśeṣaviśiṣṭadharmādhigamaśca bodhisattvena parijñeyo na sarvākārajñāneneti pratyekabuddhamārgaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:687: nirvedhabhāgīyādhigame sati yathoktamārga utpadyata iti nirvedhabhāgīyamāha -
T03bsa031_u:701: ceti catvāraḥ kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ pratyekaṃ duḥkhādisatyasambandhayuktā aihikāmutrikairguṇairyuktā
T03bsa031_u:714: paramārthataḥ tathatābuddhayorādhārādheyabhāvo na vidyata ityatastayoḥ paryāyeṇāvasthiterananujñānam /
T03bsa031_u:727: buddhatvābhilāṣiṇā svayaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādipūrvakaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthitvā tatraiva pareṣāṃ sthāpanam /
T03bsa031_u:728: dānādīnāmakṣayaṃ kartumicchatā samyaksambodhau pariṇāmanamityevaṃ mārgasatyasyākārā bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:730: kecidiha kārikārthopalakṣaṇapareṇa granthena ākārārthamanuktvā darśanamārgaṣoḍaśakṣaṇopalakṣaṇameva kevalamanukṛtamiti varṇayanti,
T03bsa031_u:733: 'ālambanamanityādi satyādhāraṃ tadākṛtiḥ' ityādikārikārthaśca kathaṃ vyākhyeya ityapare /
T03bsa031_u:735: darśanamārgānantaraṃ bhāvanāmārgābhidhāne sati svalpavaktatvena phalanimnatvena ca vineyapravṛtteḥ tatkāritraṃ tāvat -
T03bsa031_u:753: iti / svobhayaparārthopalambhatayā yathādhimokṣaṃ dṛṣṭakuśaladharmadhiṣṭhānā bhāvanāmārgādhikārādādau asākṣātkriyārūpādhimuktiḥ trividhā satī pratyekaṃ mṛdvādibhedena trividhā /
T03bsa031_u:757: tadbhāvakabodhisattvasyotsāhavardhanāya tadadhimokṣasya styutyādayo buddhādibhiḥ kriyanta iti stutiṃ,
T03bsa031_u:759: stutiḥ stobhaḥ praśaṃsā ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prati /
T03bsa031_u:797: sa ca dvividha iti prathamamabhinirhāralakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanāmārgamāha -
T03bsa031_u:805: 11 - atyantaviśuddhiḥ tadanantaraṃ yaḥ parigrahatyāgena prāpsyamānaḥ kastasyotpādānutpādaheturiti ākāṃkṣānirāsadvāreṇa dvitīyamatyantaviśuddhilakṣaṇamāha
T03bsa031_u:820: iti / āryapudgalasya yat śrāmaṇyatāphalaṃ tasya sarvavipakṣarahitatvena yā viśuddhiḥ saiva rūpādiviśuddhiḥ,
T03bsa031_u:822: prabhedatvena yasmāt tadviśuddhiḥ abhinnā acchinnā tasmāt svasāmānyalakṣaṇanānātvavirahād evaṃ viśuddhirabhidhīyate /
T03bsa031_u:830: mārgajñatādhikāre viśuddikathanaprasaṅgādātyantikī cetarā ca buddhānāṃ śrāvakādīnāṃ ca yathākramaṃ viśuddhiḥ /
T03bsa031_u:834: iti / kāradhātudhyānārūpyasamāpattaya iti navabhūmiṣvadhimātrādinavaprakāravipakṣasya pratipakṣabhāvena mṛdumṛdvādimārgo yathākramaṃ navaprakāraḥ
T03bsa031_u:835: sarvathānyathā ca viśuddhihetutvādātyantikī cetarā ca viśuddhiriti /
T03bsa031_u:838: mārgasya ceṣyate tasya codyasya parihārataḥ // Abhis_2.31 //
T03bsa031_u:839: iti / tatrādhimātrādhimātrādiḥ pratipakṣo mṛdumṛdvādirvipakṣa iti bhavitavyamiticodyasya
T03bsa031_u:841: traidhātukākārajñānajñeyānupalambhād yā samatā saiva samastapratipakṣatvādātyantikī viśuddhirbuddhasya vyavasthāpyata iti //
T03bsa031_u:846: sarvavastuparijñānaṃ vinā na mārgajñatāparijñānaṃ samyag iti sarvajñatāmāha -
T03bsa031_u:847: nāpare na pare tīre nāntarāle tayoḥ sthitā /
T03bsa031_u:849: iti / traiyadhvikadharmāṇāmanutpādākāreṇa tulyatāvabodhāt buddhabodhisattvānāṃ yā āsannībhūtā matā prajñāpāramitā,
T03bsa031_u:850: sā khalu prajñayā punarnāpare tīre saṃsāre,
T03bsa031_u:851: na pare tīre nirvāṇe ca yathākramaṃ śāśvatocchedalakṣaṇe,
T03bsa031_u:852: na tayormadhye 'pi vyavasthiteti na saṃsāranirvāṇayoḥ vyavasthitā /
T03bsa031_u:855: sarvajñatādhikārād vyatirekanirdeśena śrāvakādīnāṃ tryadhvasamatājñānābhāvāt samyak prajñāpāramitā dūrībhūteti /
T03bsa031_u:856: svādhigamamātrātmikā tu prajñāpāramitā kṛpāprajñāvaikalyānnirvāṇe saṃsāre cāvasthitā vastvastūpalambhatayeti jñeyā /
T03bsa031_u:857: 'yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā' iti nyāyādadhvatrayasamatājñānaṃ padārthāvabodha eva,
T03bsa031_u:858: nanu sa ca sarveṣāmeva samastīti kathaṃ śrāvakabodhisattvādīnāṃ samyak prajñāpāramitādūrībhāvaḥ,
T03bsa031_u:862: iti / māyākāranirmitavastunaḥ pratibhāse aviditatatsvarūpasya bhāvābhiniveśitā naiḥsvābhāvyāpratibhāsa
T03bsa031_u:863: iva kalyāṇamitrādyupāyakauśalavaikalyād vastu nimittayogena pratipattau tatsamatāparijñānamavijñātabhāvarūpāṇāṃ
T03bsa031_u:873: iti / sarveṣāṃ rūpādīnāṃ traiyadhvikānāñca dharmāṇāṃ sāsravānāsravobhayasthānīyānāmanupalambhasvarūpāṇāṃ sarvatra bhāvopalambhatayā te paraparikalpitātmādiśūnyatvena dṛṣṭāḥ /
T03bsa031_u:874: anuṣṭhānasaṃjñā tu eteṣāṃ pratipakṣabhūtāni viparyāsapravṛttatvena heyatvāt vipakṣo bhavati /
T03bsa031_u:879: iti / trimaṇḍalaviśuddhyā dānādāvanātmāvabodhena svaparayorniyojanaṃ samyak pravṛttatvāt sarvasaktinicayasthānapratiṣedhena copādeyatvāt sarvathā pratipakṣaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:880: tathāgatādiṣu namaskārādiḥ puṇyasambhārahetutvena pratipakṣo 'pi san sūkṣmasaktirūpatayā na sarvathā pratipakṣa iti vipakṣo bhavati /
T03bsa031_u:883: iti / yasmāt svabhāvenaiva dharmagotrāṇāṃ śūnyatvāt teṣāṃ gāmbhīryam,
T03bsa031_u:887: iti / rūpādisarvadharmāṇāmekaiva prakṛtiḥ yaduta niḥsvabhāva iti jñānajñeyasamataikaparijñāne saktirvarjitā bhavati /
T03bsa031_u:890: iti / yasmāt sarvavijñānopalavdhārthanirākaraṇena tasyāḥ prakṛterdurbodhatā kathitā,
T03bsa031_u:897: evaṃ kṛtvā yathokto vai jñeyaḥ sarvajñatānate /
T03bsa031_u:899: iti / sarvajñatādhikāre yathoktanayena yathākramaṃ śrāvakabodhisattvādīnāṃ vipakṣapratipakṣayorayaṃ prabhedo 'vasātavyaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:901: vipakṣādi evamabhidhāya tayorvibhāvanāyāṃ kaḥ prayoga iti cet prayogamāha -
T03bsa031_u:904: avikāro na karttā ca prayogo duṣkarastridhā /
T03bsa031_u:920: samatādvāreṇa prayogo bhāvanīya iti prayogānantaraṃ samatāmāha -
T03bsa031_u:921: caturdhā 'mananā tasya rūpādau samatā matā // Abhis_3.10 //
T03bsa031_u:924: prayogasamatāṃ pratividhya darśanamārgo bhāvanīya iti darśanamārgamāha -
T03bsa031_u:927: iti / pratisatyaṃ dharmajñānakṣāntirdharmajñānamanvayajñānakṣāntiranvayajñānamityevaṃ ṣoḍaśakṣaṇātmakaḥ sarvajñatādhikāre darśanamārgo bhavati
T03bsa031_u:932: pravyāhāreṇa nāsyārthaḥ pareṣu prāptaye yataḥ // Abhis_3.13 //
T03bsa031_u:940: ātmānātmasvabhāvābhāvānnotpannaṃ na niruddhaṃ na saṃkliṣṭaṃ na vyavadātamityādayo duḥkhasatyākārā bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:953: nairyāṇikānairyāṇikavikalpatvenobhaye vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇe jñeye śabde jñānasyānutpattiriti mārgasatyākārā bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:954: evamete ākārāḥ sarvajñatākṣaṇā iti bodhisattvānāṃ darśamārgaḥ,
T03bsa031_u:956: śrāvakamārgo bodhisattvena parijñātavyo na sākṣātkaraṇīya iti bhāvanāmārgo na nirdiṣṭaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:958: iti seyaṃ punaḥ seyaṃ khalu punastridhā /
T03bsa031_u:962: iyaṃ sarvajñatā cetyevaṃ parivartatrayeṇa prakāratrayaṃ parisamāptam /
T03bsa031_u:966: parijñātatrisarvajñatāvaśitvārthaṃ punaḥ sarvākāramārgavastujñānasaṅgraheṇa trisarvajñatāṃ bhāvayatīti sarvākārābhisambodha ityāha -
T03bsa031_u:968: sarvajñatānāṃ traividhyāt trividhā eva te matāḥ // Abhis_4.1 //
T03bsa031_u:973: catvāraḥ pratisatyaṃ te mārge pañcadaśa smṛtāḥ // Abhis_4.2 //
T03bsa031_u:975: iti dvādaśa ākārā hi yathākramaṃ duḥkhādisatyatrayasya anityādilakṣaṇā bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:977: sarvajñatayā pratyekabuddhāḥ saṅgṛhītā iti teṣāṃ jñeyāvaraṇapratipakṣatvena dvau sāsravānāsravabhāvanāmārgau ceti mārgāḥ triprakārāḥ /
T03bsa031_u:978: tatra prathame akārakājānakāsaṃkrāntyavinayākārā iti catvāro yathākramaṃ mārgādilakṣaṇāḥ (kleśāvaraṇapratipakṣe) bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:987: hetau mārge ca duḥkhe ca nirodho ca yathākramam /
T03bsa031_u:988: aṣṭau te sapta pañceti ṣoḍaśeti ca kīrtitāḥ // Abhis_4.3 //
T03bsa031_u:990: duḥkhanirodhasatye ca phalamityarthadvāreṇa nirdiṣṭe samudayamārgaduḥkhanirodhasatyeṣu yathāsaṃkhyamaṣṭādyākārā boddhavyāḥ //
T03bsa031_u:991: tatra virāga-asamutthāna-śānta-arāga-adveṣa-amoha-niḥkleśa-niḥsattvākārā eva yathākramaṃ yo hetuḥ chando rāgo nandī ca,
T03bsa031_u:994: yaśca pratyayaḥ sattvābhiniveśa iti eteṣāṃ pratipakṣabhūtatvena trayastraya eka eka ityaṣṭāvākārāḥ samudayasatye bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:995: apramāṇa-antadvayānanugama-asambhinna-aparāmṛṣṭa-avikalpa-aprameya-asaṅgākārā-yathākramaṃ yaḥ sarvasattvāvakāśado mārgaḥ yathā va sarvasattvāvakāśadaḥ,
T03bsa031_u:998: yacca niryāṇamiti tatsvabhāvā dvau dvau dvāveka iti saptākārā mārgasatye bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:999: anitya-duḥkha-śūnya-anātmākārāḥ pañcamālakṣaṇākārasvabhāvā ityevaṃ pañcākārā duḥkhasatye bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:1006: svabhāvanirodhena abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatākāra ekaḥ niḥsaraṇākārātmaka ityevaṃ ṣoḍaśākārā nirodhasatye bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:1010: śiṣyāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāṃ ca yathākramam // Abhis_4.4 //
T03bsa031_u:1013: smṛtyupasthānamārabhya buddhākāraparyantānāṃ hi trisarvajñatāsaṅgṛhītamārgadvāreṇa sarvākārajñatayā sarveṣāmāryapudgalānāṃ saṅgrahaṇena ca yathāsaṃkhyaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ saptatriṃśat,
T03bsa031_u:1017: tato 'vatīrṇasya vīryamiti utpannānutpannasya akuśalasya kuśalasya ca yathākramaṃ samyakprahāṇānutpādanārthaṃ vardhana (bhūyobhāva)
T03bsa031_u:1020: kṛtacittaparikarmaṇo 'nantaramūṣmamūrdhaprayogaḥ iti ūṣmamūrdhasvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñendriyākārāḥ pañca samyagabhisamayaprāyogikamārgaḥ
T03bsa031_u:1021: adhigatoṣmādeḥ kṣāntyagradharmaprayoga iti kṣāntyagradharmasvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñābalākārāḥ pañca abhisamayasaṃśleṣamārgaḥ
T03bsa031_u:1024: viśuddhanairyāṇikamārga iti śiṣyāṇāṃ sarvajñatāmārgādhiṣṭhānāḥ saptatriṃśadākārā bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:1027: traidhātukapraṇidhānapratipakṣaḥ iti tatsvabhāvā yathākramaṃ śūnyānātmākārasvabhāvaṃ prathamaṃ vimokṣamukham,
T03bsa031_u:1030: avibhāvitavibhāvitarūpasaṃjñatvād yathākramamadhyātmaṃ rūpyarūpīti bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyatītyetau nirmāṇāvaraṇapratipakṣeṇa dvau vimokṣau /
T03bsa031_u:1031: śubhāśubharūpanirmāṇe ca yathākramamābhogaḥ prātikūlyañca saṃkleśaḥ tatpratipakṣeṇa
T03bsa031_u:1032: śubhaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharatītyeko vimokṣa iti vimokṣākārāḥ
T03bsa031_u:1034: mokṣānukūlavihāramārgasvabhāvāścaturārūpyasamāpattyākārāḥ śāntavihārasvabhāvaḥ saṃjñāveditanirodhākāra eka iti pañcākārā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramārgaḥ
T03bsa031_u:1041: buddho 'hamityātmapratijñāne rāgādīnāmantarāyatvākhyāne sarvajñatādimārgasya niryāṇatvaprakāśane kṣīṇāsravatvenātmano 'bhyupagame ca paryanuyokturabhāvena vaiśāradyākārāścatvāraḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1042: paryāye dharmalakṣaṇe janapadabhāṣāyāṃ dharmaprabhede ca yathākramaṃ dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidākārāścatvāraḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1043: nāsti skhalitaḥ ravitaṃ muṣitasmṛtirasamāhitaṃ cittaṃ nānātvasaṃjñā apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā cetyevamākārāḥ ṣaṭ /
T03bsa031_u:1044: nāstichandato vīryataḥ smṛtitaḥ samādheḥ prajñāyāḥ vimukteśca parihāṇirityevamākārāḥ ṣaṭ /
T03bsa031_u:1052: anāsravā eva sarvākārajñatākārāḥ sarvathā savāsanasarvakleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇena samyaksambuddhasya sarvadharmavaśavartitvād,
T03bsa031_u:1055: te ca prayoktāraṃ vinā kathayitumaśakyā iti śravaṇādibhājanaṃ prayoktāramāha -
T03bsa031_u:1064: kalyāṇamitrairadhiṣṭhitāśca yathākramamākāralakṣaṇāyā māturasyā granthaśravaṇadhāraṇāmuṣitārthayathānayamanaskārāṇāṃ bhājanaṃ buddhādibhiḥ matamiti
T03bsa031_u:1074: phalaratnapradātā ca śuddhakaḥ sāvadhiśca saḥ // Abhis_4.11 //
T03bsa031_u:1087: prayogānantaraṃ guṇadarśanapūrvakaṃ sutarāmabhyasyante prayogā iti tadguṇān āha -
T03bsa031_u:1093: ityetadaviparītaprayogānumodanāt caturdaśa guṇā utpadyante prāpyante ca /
T03bsa031_u:1096: yeṣāṃ parivarjanena prayogā bhāvayitavyā ityantarāyakarān doṣānāha -
T03bsa031_u:1146: doṣānantaraṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ guṇadoṣādānatyāgena prayogā bhāvanīyā lakṣaṇajñāna pūrvakamiti teṣāṃ lakṣaṇamāha -
T03bsa031_u:1147: lakṣyate yena tajjñeyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ trividhaṃ ca tat /
T03bsa031_u:1148: jñānaṃ viśeṣa kāritraṃ svabhāvo yaśca lakṣyate // Abhis_4.13 //
T03bsa031_u:1150: karmasādhanaparigraheṇa ca svabhāvātmakamiti lakṣaṇaṃ caturvidhaṃ boddhavyam /
T03bsa031_u:1151: tatra tāvat jñānalakṣaṇaṃ trisarvajñatābhedena bhidyamānaṃ sarvajñatādvāreṇāha -
T03bsa031_u:1161: ṣoḍaśabhiḥ jñānākāraprakāraiḥ yathānayaṃ sarvajñatāprayogāḥ samyag lakṣyanta iti
T03bsa031_u:1170: dharmatā 'vikopanāsaṃskārāvikalpaprabhedālakṣaṇāni cetyebhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ jñānākāraprakāraiḥ yathāvat mārgajñatāprayogā lakṣyanta iti jñānalakṣaṇaṃ mārgajñatāsaṅgṛhītam /
T03bsa031_u:1179: ebhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhirjñānākāraprakāraiḥ yathāvat sarvākārajñatāprayogā lakṣyanta iti jñānalakṣaṇaṃ
T03bsa031_u:1181: navabhirantaraślokairevaṃ jñānalakṣaṇamabhidhāya jñānākāreṇa paricchinnānāṃ viśeṣo jñeya iti jñānalakṣaṇānantaram antaraślokena viśeṣalakṣaṇamāha
T03bsa031_u:1207: abhiniveśānāsvāda iti ṣoḍaśātmakaḥ yathākramaṃ duḥkhādisatyakṣaṇānāṃ viśeṣaḥ,
T03bsa031_u:1208: yena śrāvakādimārgebhyo bodhisattvādīnāṃ mārgajñatādidvaye viśeṣamārgo viśiṣyate /
T03bsa031_u:1211: hitaṃ sukhaṃ ca trāṇaṃ ca śaraṇaṃ layanaṃ nṛṇām /
T03bsa031_u:1212: parāyaṇa ca dvīpaṃ ca pariṇāyakasaṃjñakam // Abhis_4.27 //
T03bsa031_u:1219: kāritrākārairevaṃ yathāvad sarvajñatātrayasya prayogā lakṣyanta iti kāritralakṣaṇam /
T03bsa031_u:1220: kāritralakṣaṇenāvacchinnānāṃ kaḥ svabhāva iti antaraślokatrayeṇa svabhāvalakṣaṇamāha -
T03bsa031_u:1226: lakṣīva lakṣyate ceti caturthaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ matam // Abhis_4.31 //
T03bsa031_u:1236: bhāvābhāvādisvabhāvatrayānupalambha iti ete sarvākārajñatāyāḥ sapta svabhāvāḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1237: ityevaṃ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ svabhāvairyathāvat trisarvajñatāprayogā lakṣīva lakṣyante iti caturthaṃ svabhāvalakṣaṇaṃ matam /
T03bsa031_u:1238: ityevaṃ sāmānyena ekatra kṛtāni ekanavatiḥ lakṣaṇāni bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:1243: iti / animittālambanajñānākāreṇa dānādipāramitā ārabhya sarvākārajñatāparyantaṃ svasantāne samudāgame kauśalamevāsmin sarvākārābhisambodhe mokṣabhāgīyamiṣṭam
T03bsa031_u:1249: iti / anindriyasvabhāvāḥ śraddhāvīryasmṛtisamādhiviśiṣṭaprajñāḥ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ buddha-dāna-āśayasampatti-avikalpa-sarvadharmasarvākāraparijñādiṣu pañcavidhaviṣayeṣu kauśalam /
T03bsa031_u:1264: saṃkṣepato 'kuśalakuśalayoryathāsaṃkhyaṃ hānopādānābhyāṃ svayaṃ nivṛttasya pravṛttasya ca,
T03bsa031_u:1265: taddvārā anyeṣāṃ pāpānnivartanaṃ kuśale ca pravartanamiti dvāvākārau /
T03bsa031_u:1266: tathaiva anyeṣāṃ svayampravṛttau varṇavādo 'nukūlatā ceti dharmaprabhedadvaividhyena hi anantākārā iti sattvālambane mūrdhagato bhavati /
T03bsa031_u:1269: pūrvavat svaparādhiṣṭhānapācanamocanādyākāraiḥ sattvālambanameva agradharmā bhavantītyevaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyā bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:1277: ye bodhisattvā vartante so 'trāvaivartiko gaṇaḥ // Abhis_4.38 //
T03bsa031_u:1278: iti / ye vīrāḥ caturṣu nirvedhabhāgīyeṣu vakṣyamāṇadarśanamārgabhāvanāmārgayoḥ tattadadhigamanayena sthitāḥ,
T03bsa031_u:1280: kiñca teṣāmāveṇikalakṣaṇamiti cet tāvadekena antaraślokena nirvedhabhāgīyasthitānāṃ lakṣaṇamāha -
T03bsa031_u:1284: kāni ca nivṛttyāderlakṣaṇāni iti cet ṣaḍbhiḥ antaraślokaiḥ pratipādayitumāha -
T03bsa031_u:1294: māra ityeva bodhaśca caryā buddhānumoditā // Abhis_4.44 //
T03bsa031_u:1304: prayogasampattyā kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhamauddhatyakaukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ceti pañcanīvaraṇairasaṃvāsaḥ,
T03bsa031_u:1316: trimaṇḍalaviśuddhyā sarvāsu caryāsu buddhānumoditatvamiti eva ākāraḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1317: yathākramaṃ ūṣmamūrdhakṣāntyagradharmeṣvavasthito bodhisattvo 'nuttarabodherna nivartata iti ebhirviṃśatiliṅgairvijñeyam /
T03bsa031_u:1319: kṣāntijñānakṣaṇāḥ ṣaṭ ca pañca pañca ca dṛkpathe /
T03bsa031_u:1321: iti / duḥkhādisatyadvārā dharmānvayajñānakṣāntyādayaḥ ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇāḥ darśanamārgasthabodhisattvasyāvaivartikalakṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
T03bsa031_u:1328: samare matsarādau ca neti yogānuyogayoḥ // Abhis_4.49 //
T03bsa031_u:1336: dharmapravicayasāmarthyād dhyānārūpyasamāpattyādyudayāṅgaparikṣaya iti catvāra eva duḥkhasyākārā bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:1340: satpuruṣadharmatayā samyagupakaraṇājīvaviśuddhatvamiti catvāra eva samudayākārā bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:1348: ekāntaniṣṭhatvena sarvākārajñatādidharmārthaṃ jīvitatyāga iti catvāro mārgākārā bhavanti /
T03bsa031_u:1352: adhigamānurūpa eva sarvatra yogināṃ vyavahāraḥ anyatra sattvavinayaprayojanavaśāditi jñāpanāyopacāreṇoktam,
T03bsa031_u:1354: tadanantaraṃ satyapi bhāvanāmārgasthāvaivartikalakṣaṇe 'nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhirutpadyate ' iti nyāyāt tāvadbhāvanāmārgaṃ viśeṣayannāha
T03bsa031_u:1359: sā śūnyatādergāmbhīryaṃ śūnyatādikamiti gāmbhīryayogād gambhīro 'bhyāsapatha iti /
T03bsa031_u:1362: nirvedhāṅgeṣu dṛṅmārge bhāvanāmārga eva ca // Abhis_4.53 //
T03bsa031_u:1363: iti / śrutacintābhāvanāmayaprajñayā samādhau vā prayogamaulapṛṣṭhabhāvinyā prajñayā
T03bsa031_u:1364: yathākramaṃ triṣu nirvedhāṅgādiṣu nirdiṣṭānāmarthānāṃ punaḥ punaścintātulananidhyānāni
T03bsa031_u:1369: iti / vikalpakleśā bodhisattvā iti kṛtvā yathaudārikañca tamaḥ sūkṣmeṇālokena hanyate
T03bsa031_u:1371: teṣāṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrapratipakṣāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātrabhedāt tathā paramārthataḥ
T03bsa031_u:1374: tattajjinajananīnāmekaikaṃ prakāramadhikṛtya asaṃkhyeyāprameyāpramāṇapuṇyaprasavavacanād bahudhā bhedāt kathaṃ navaprakāra iti cedāha -
T03bsa031_u:1378: ekasminnarthe pratyuktāstasmāt paramārthena yathoktalakṣaṇasya bhāvanāmārgasya bhedaṃ kartuṃ na kṣamāḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1381: śūnyatālakṣaṇatayā atiśayādhānābhāvād kiñcidapi mandabuddhipuruṣaṃ prati na kriyata eveti āśaṅkyāha -
T03bsa031_u:1383: bhāvanākhyena kiṃ hīnaṃ vartmanā kimudāgatam // Abhis_4.56 //
T03bsa031_u:1384: dharmatāsvarūpasya abhimatamārgavastuno niḥsvabhāvatayā tattvānyatvobhayānubhayatvairavācyasya bhāvanātiśayādhānābhāvāt vipakṣapratipakṣayoryathākramamapagamodayau na yujyete /
T03bsa031_u:1385: yadyevaṃ bhāvanāsaṃjñakena mārgeṇa kiṃ vipakṣasvarūpaṃ parityaktam,
T03bsa031_u:1391: tathatālakṣaṇā bodhiḥ so 'pi tallakṣaṇo mataḥ // Abhis_4.57 //
T03bsa031_u:1394: tadvadayamapyāgantukamalāpagamād bhāvanayā sākṣātkṛto mārgaḥ tathatālakṣaṇo 'pi saṃvṛtyābhimatārthakriyākārī /
T03bsa031_u:1395: paramārthatastu hānivṛddhyabhāva evāṅgīkriyata iti aprayoga eva prayogatvāt na doṣaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1396: evaṃ sati saṃvṛtyā arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ na ghaṭata ityāśaṅkayannāha -
T03bsa031_u:1397: pūrveṇa bodhirno yuktā manasā paścimena vā /
T03bsa031_u:1407: tathaiva dvitīyakṣaṇe 'pi viśiṣṭajvālāvartyorūtpattikṣaṇe prathamakṣaṇamantareṇa nityasattvādiprasaṅgatayā saṃvṛtyutpādābhāvāt kāryakāraṇalakṣaṇadāhyadāhakābhāvaḥ
T03bsa031_u:1411: tadā nirhetukavināśe 'pi kāraṇakāryayoḥ yathākramaṃ tulyakālaniranvayavināśodayād dāhyadāhakabhāvaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1412: tasmāt prathamakṣaṇe dvitīyārciranapekṣya vartī na dahyate,
T03bsa031_u:1413: dvitīyakṣaṇenāpi prathamārciranapekṣya vartī na dahyata iti dīpadṛṣṭāntanyāyena pūrvāparībhūtakṣaṇayorekaviṣayopayogajñāpanapareṇa
T03bsa031_u:1416: yathoktenaiva ca dṛṣṭāntena aṣṭaprakārā gambhīradharmatā pratisartavyā iti bhāvanāmārgasthabodhisattvānāmavaivartikalakṣaṇakathanāya
T03bsa031_u:1418: utpāde ca nirodhe ca tathatāyāṃ gabhīratā /
T03bsa031_u:1420: iti / na pūrvāparakṣaṇābhyāṃ na ca niḥsvabhāvatayā bhāvanāgamyaviśiṣṭārthotpādanamiti pratītyasamutpādaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1421: sarvabhāvodaya eva niḥsvabhāva iti saṃvṛtyā nirudhyata iti nirodhaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1435: iti / vipakṣapratipakṣasāṃsārikavaiyadānikadharmāṇāṃ pratibhāsamātrasvabhāvasvapnasadṛśatvena avagamāt saṃsāranirvāṇayornānātvena avikalpa iti samatā /
T03bsa031_u:1436: nanu svapnasadṛśatve sati daśākuśaladānādīnāmabhāvaḥ svapnāvasthāyāmiva jāgraddaśāyāmapi syāditicodyānāṃ parihārā bāhyārthavādanaye kṣaṇikatayā
T03bsa031_u:1438: iti siddhāntāt paramārthato na kaścinna kenaciddhato nāpi kayacid dravyaṃ kenacid
T03bsa031_u:1441: tathaiva svapnasadṛśe vastuni tadanurūpārthe bhāvādyabhiniveśena akhaṇḍitasakalaviparyāsabandhanānāmityevaṃ tatpatihārāḥ tatpakṣāścānyatra abhihitā ityavagantavyāḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1444: ityeva svapne 'pyupacittakuśalākuśalasya prabuddhāvasthāyāmaho kṛtaḥ sukṛta ityanumodane pṛṣṭhāvasthācittābhiniveśaparipuṣṭyā paripoṣaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1447: ubhayasamatāvibhāvanayā svabuddhakṣetre buddho bhaviṣyatīti tadanantaraṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhirityāha -
T03bsa031_u:1467: sarvaviṣayajñānatvena apramāṇamiti prajñāpāramitāyā daśavidhaviṣayāṇāṃ sākṣātkriyāyāṃ kālākālajñānaprayoga eva upāyakauśalaṃ bhavatīti /
T03bsa031_u:1471: prāptasarvākārabhisambodhasya prakarṣaparyanto 'dhigamo bhavatīti tatsukhāvabodhāya liṅgādyabhidhānapuraḥsaraṃ mūrdhābhisamayamāha -
T03bsa031_u:1473: mūrdhaprāptasya yogasya liṅgaṃ dvādaśadhā matam // Abhis_5.1 //
T03bsa031_u:1489: upamāṃ bahudhā kṛtvā vivṛddhiḥ ṣoḍaśātmikā // Abhis_5.2 //
T03bsa031_u:1506: puṣpādibhiḥ buddhapūjāyāḥ śubhādikāṃ bahudhā upamāṃ kṛtvā uttarottaraviśeṣotkarṣeṇa ṣoḍaśāvasthātmikā vivṛddhirbhavati /
T03bsa031_u:1518: iti / sambhavatpramāṇasya palapramāṇena parimāṇaṃ pramātuṃ śakyata iti nyāyāt caturdvīpāditrisāhasralokadhātūnāṃ
T03bsa031_u:1519: sarveṣāṃ pāramitādīnāṃ samādhipuṇyajñānasvarūpāṇāṃ pṛthak pṛthak upamāṃ kṛtvā tebhyo
T03bsa031_u:1526: pravṛtau ca nivṛtau ca pratyekaṃ tau navātmakau /
T03bsa031_u:1529: dharmasyādānasantyāgākāreṇa grāhyāviti kleśavad vipakṣau grāhyavikalpau vastunyapratibaddhavṛttitvena
T03bsa031_u:1534: grāhau cenna tathā sto 'rthau kasya tau grāhakau matau /
T03bsa031_u:1536: iti / pṛthagjanāryapudgalayoryathākramaṃ dravyaprajñaptisatpuruṣādhiṣṭhānau grāhakavikalpau vibandhakatvād vipakṣau viṣayabhedena pratyekaṃ navaprakārāviti /
T03bsa031_u:1537: yadā viṣayabhāvāpannagrāhyāvarthau na tathā grāhyarūpeṇa bhavatastadā na kasyacit tau grāhakāviti,
T03bsa031_u:1539: kathaṃ pravṛtyadhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpo navadhāḥ? ityāha -
T03bsa031_u:1552: samyagupāyakauśalabalena sarvajananirvāṇapratiṣṭhāpanakriyāphale ca nirdoṣatayā upādeyatvena pravṛttiḥ kāryā,
T03bsa031_u:1553: ityevaṃ pravṛttipakṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpo navaprakāro darśanamārgaprayogāvasthāyāṃ praheyo mata iti /
T03bsa031_u:1554: kathaṃ nivṛttipakṣadhiṣṭhāno dvitīyo grāhyavikalpo navadheti? āha -
T03bsa031_u:1569: mahāyānasarvasaṃgrāhakatvena sarvākārajñatāsarvanirvāṇapaścādanugamane ca sadoṣatayā grāhyatvena vinivṛttiḥ kāryā /
T03bsa031_u:1571: navadhā bodhisattvānāṃ darśanamārge cittacaittapravṛttyavasthāyāṃ praheyo mata iti /
T03bsa031_u:1572: kathaṃ dravyasatpṛthagjanapuruṣādhiṣṭhānaḥ prathamo grāhakavikalpo navadhā? ityāha -
T03bsa031_u:1576: saktau ca pratipakṣe ca yathecchaṃ ca gatikṣatau // Abhis_5.14 //
T03bsa031_u:1585: samyagavijñātaprajñāpāramitatvena yathecchagamanavyāghāte ca pāramārthikabhāvābhiniveśena prathamo grāhakavikalpo navaprakāro darśanamārgaprayogāvasthāyāṃ praheyo mata iti /
T03bsa031_u:1586: kathaṃ prajñaptisatpuruṣādhiṣṭhāno dvitīyo grāhakavikalpo navadhā? ityāha -
T03bsa031_u:1600: dvitīyo grāhakavikalpo navaprakāro darśanamārgacittacaittapravṛttyavasthāyāṃ praheyo mata iti /
T03bsa031_u:1601: darśanamārge vipakṣaṃ sapratipakṣamevaṃ nirdiśya yanmahābodhiniṣpattaye darśanamārgo yena kāraṇena sahita iṣyate,
T03bsa031_u:1605: iti / vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇabodhau darśanādimārgasandarśanena anyeṣāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ prathamam (kāraṇam) /
T03bsa031_u:1608: kā punariyaṃ mahābodhiryadarthaṃ yathoktakāraṇasahāyo darśanamārgo 'bhipreta ityantaraślokena mahābodhimāha -
T03bsa031_u:1614: gaganakamalavadvā yathākramaṃ malānāṃ kṣayotpādābhāvād akṣayānutpādajñānātmikā sarvadharmāviparītādhigatilakṣaṇā
T03bsa031_u:1616: yasmādevaṃ ato ye bhāvavināśābhisandhinā kṣīṇe kṣīṇamiti jñānaṃ kṣayajñānam,
T03bsa031_u:1619: teṣāṃ kṣayānutpādavaikalyād etajjñānaṃ na ghaṭata ityantaraślokenāha -
T03bsa031_u:1621: vikalpajātaṃ ki kṣīṇaṃ kiṃ vānutpattimāgatam // Abhis_5.19 //
T03bsa031_u:1622: iti / utpannānutpannayorthathākramaṃ kṣayotpattivighātalakṣaṇanirodhena aniruddhāyāṃ paramārthatastathatārūpāyāṃ prakṛtau satyāṃ katarad vikalpādirūpamutpannaṃ
T03bsa031_u:1623: kataraccānutpannam anutpattidharmakaṃ jātaṃ darśanamārgabalena vitathabhāvābhiniveśināṃ bhavatām?
T03bsa031_u:1626: anyathā tāttvikadharmasattvopagame bhagavataḥ sarvathā vikalpakleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ mahadvismayasthānīyaṃ syādityantaraślokenāha -
T03bsa031_u:1627: sattvā ca nāma dharmāṇāṃ jñeye cāvaraṇakṣayaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1628: kathyate yatparaiḥ śāsturatra vismīyate mayā // Abhis_5.20 //
T03bsa031_u:1632: bāhyārthābhiniveśaṃ tiraskṛtya grāhyābhāve grāhakābhāva iti nidhyāyaṃstāmapi grāhakākāralakṣaṇāṃ
T03bsa031_u:1633: vijñaptimātratāmavadhūya advayajñānameva kevalaṃ bhāvato bhāvarūpamiti niścitya tadapi
T03bsa031_u:1636: māyopamātmapratibhāsadhiyo nirvikalpāyāḥ kathañcit pratyātmavedyāyāḥ samutpāde jñeyāvaraṇaṃ
T03bsa031_u:1638: anyathā paraiḥ sarvadā ākāśasya dravyābhāvamātrarūpadhāraṇavad anādheyānapaneyasvarūpadhāraṇād
T03bsa031_u:1639: dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ jñānamātrarūpāṇāṃ jñeyalakṣaṇānāñca yadi paramārthato vidyamānatā
T03bsa031_u:1640: syāt tadā pratipakṣabhāvanayā ākāśasyeva teṣāṃ na kiñcit kriyate /
T03bsa031_u:1641: ato bhāvābhiniveśaviparyāsāvinivṛtyā yad bhagavataḥ sarvathāḥ jñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ dharmāṇāñca yatsattopagamyate paraiḥ tatparasparaviruddhārthābhyupagame vismayasthānīyaṃ bhavet /
T03bsa031_u:1644: draṣṭavyaṃ bhūtato bhūtaṃ bhūtadarśī vimucyate // Abhis_5.21 //
T03bsa031_u:1646: kasyaciddharmasyākṛtvā idameva pratītyasamutpannaṃ saṃvṛtyā tathyarūpaṃ rūpādiniḥsvabhāvādirūpato nirūpaṇīyam,
T03bsa031_u:1647: evañca māyāgajena aparamāyāgajaparājayavad viparyāsanivṛtyā tatvadarśī vimucyata iti /
T03bsa031_u:1649: ekaikasyaiva dānādai teṣāṃ yaḥ saṅgraho mithaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1651: iti / dānādiṣaṭpāramitānāṃ pratyekamekaikabhāve dānādau yaḥ parasparaṃ sarvapāramitāsaṅgrahaḥ,
T03bsa031_u:1652: so 'traikakṣaṇiko mūrdhābhisamaye duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāntisaṃgṛhītaḥ trimaṇḍalaviśuddhiprabhāvitaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadākāranirjāto darśanamārgaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1656: tatra vaśitvārthaṃ tāmeva punaḥ punarbhāvayatīti antaraślokenāha -
T03bsa031_u:1659: iti / sa darśanamārgaprāpto yogī kleśajñeyāvaraṇabhayābhāvāt siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ (nāma)
T03bsa031_u:1660: samādhiṃ samāpadya uttarakālamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityādyanulomaṃ jarāmaraṇanirodho jātinirodhād ityādipratilomaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ nirūpayati
T03bsa031_u:1662: darśanamārgamevamabhidhāya vipakṣaprahāṇādikam ādhārapratipattipūrvakaṃ subodhamiti ādhāraṃ bhāvanāmārgamāha -
T03bsa031_u:1667: iti / bodhisattvāḥ prathamadhyānamārabhya yāvannirodhaṃ gatvā tato nirodhamārabhya yāvat prathamadhyānamāgamya evamanulomapratiloma (krama)
T03bsa031_u:1668: -dvayena caturdhyāna caturārūpyanirodhalakṣaṇā nava samāpattīrgatvā āgamya punaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadya tato vyutthāya nirodham,
T03bsa031_u:1670: tato vyutthāya anantarasamāpattimālambya kāmāvacaraṃ vijñānaṃ maryādārūpeṇāvasthāpya upāyakauśalyabalena vyutthāya tadeva vijñānamasamāhitamāmukhīkṛtya,
T03bsa031_u:1671: tato nirodhaṃ tato 'samāhitaṃ tato nirodhamekaṃ parityajya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ tato 'samāhim tato dvayaṃ parityajya ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ tato 'samāhitam,
T03bsa031_u:1672: evaṃ yāvadaṣṭau parityajya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ tato 'samāhitam,
T03bsa031_u:1673: ityekādiparityāgenānirodhasamāpattiṃ yāvad visadṛśadvāreṇa gacchatītyatulyagām avaskandasamāpattiṃ vaśitvalakṣaṇām āmukhīkṛtya bhāvanāmārgo bhavati /
T03bsa031_u:1674: bhāvanāmārgamevamabhidhāya tatra praheyaḥ caturvidho vipakṣo vaktavyaḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1687: naiḥsvābhāvyabhāvakatvena bhāvanāmārge ca prathamo grāhyavikalpaḥ asyāmavasthāyāṃ praheyatvena bhāvanāmārgaprayogāvasthāyāṃ navavidho viṣayī

T03bsa031_u:1768: viparyastamatīnāṃ kīdṛśīḥ vipratipattīḥ nirākṛtya sa samādhirutpādayitavya iti cet?

T03bsa031_u:1797: dānena prajñayā yāvad buddhādau smṛtibhiśca sā /

T03bsa031_u:1825: calayati tathā pūrvapraṇidhānāvedhadharmadhātusāmarthyād ekasminneva kṣaṇe ekamanāsravamālambyamānaṃ
T03bsa031_u:1828: evaṃ prathamaṃ nirdiśya vipākadharmatāvasthānāsravasarvadharmaikakṣaṇalakṣaṇo bhavatyekakṣaṇābhisambodho dvitīyaḥ / ityāha -

T03bsa031_u:1833: vipākāvasthāprāptānām anāsravadharmāṇāṃ bodhāt jñānaṃ prajñāpāramitā ekakṣaṇābhisambodha iti /

T03bsa031_u:1846: nirantaradīrghakāladvayapratibhāsaprahāṇābhyāsasātmībhāvād unmūlitadvayapratibhāsavāsano yadā bodhisattvo grāhyagrāhakayogena svapnaṃ grāhyaṃ svapnadaśiṃnaṃ grāhakaṃ nekṣate,
T03bsa031_u:1847: tadā sarve 'pvevaṃdharmāṇo dharmā iti dharmāṇāmadvayaṃ tattvam ekenaiva kṣaṇenādhigacchatītyekakṣaṇābhisambodha iti /

T03bsa031_u:1858: ayaṃ munerbuddhasya bhagavato lokottareṇa mārgeṇa prāpyate,

T03bsa031_u:1899: sarve cāśrayaparāvṛttyā parāvṛttā bodhipakṣādayo niṣprapañcajñānātmakā dharmakāyo 'bhidhīyata iti kecit /

T03bsa031_u:1904: sa eva ca dharmatākāyo dharmakāya iti bhāvapratyayalopād vyapadiśyata iti vyākhyāya,
T03bsa031_u:1905: ke punaste 'nāsravā dharmā yeṣāṃ prakṛtilakṣaṇo dharmakāya ityāśaṅkya 'bodhipakṣāpramāṇānī' tyādikārikāmavatārayanti /
T03bsa031_u:1912: anye tūpadarśitaprayojanasāmarthyāt kārikābandhānurodhena jñānasyaiva kāritreṇa sambandhārthaṃ caivamuktam,
T03bsa031_u:1917: iti / mā 'smaddarśanāt kasyacit kleśotpattiḥ syāditi manuṣyakleśotpattiparihāritā śrāvakādyaraṇāsamādhiḥ /
T03bsa031_u:1918: tathāgatānāṃ tu sakalajanakleśaprabandhonmūlanaṃ syāditi grāmādiṣu araṇāsamādhiviśeṣaḥ /
